capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-documented fact. He was indeed the Potions master at the school for many years, and his... complicated history with the students and faculty is still widely discussed among fans of the series.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Snape's family history and it's really interesting. He comes from a mixed wizarding background, which is pretty unique.
